description: SCMProviderGeneratorGitea defines a connection info specific to Gitea.

allBranches.description: Scan all branches instead of just the default branch.

api.description: The Gitea URL to talk to. For example https://gitea.mydomain.com/.

insecure.title: Allow self-signed TLS / Certificates; default: false

owner.description: Gitea organization or user to scan. Required.

tokenRef.description: Utility struct for a reference to a secret key.
